en: This mode's air attack is best against groups of Light air units.
Build a Bunker with 4 Marines inside.
Build a Barracks. Each turn it sends 2 Marines.
Build a Factory. Each turn it sends 1 Hellbat.
Build an Engineering Bay. Until destroyed, it gives your biological units +15% damage and +1 armor.
Deal 1500 damage to the toughest enemy unit.
Reveal all enemy cloaked units during the next battle phase. Draw a card.
Launch 6 Seeker Missiles at clusters of enemy units.
Your biological units lose 10% of their life, gain Rush, and get +50% attack and movement speed for 2 turns (doesn't stack).
They enter siege mode upon sighting an enemy.
They burrow in your defensive area.
They prioritize repairing injured mechanical units and structures.
They unload 8 defensive Marines each, then help evacuate retreating tactical units.

Build a Sensor Tower, which is a long-ranged detector.
Build a Refinery. Until destroyed, it increases your gas limit by 1. Launch: Add 2 Vespene Barrels to your hand.
Build a Starport. Each turn it sends 1 Viking (Fighter Mode).
Deal 1500 damage to the most expensive enemy structure.

Deal 800 damage to the toughest two biological enemy units.
They target the center of the map with their anti-ground mode.
They each unload 4 Marines and 2 Marauders near the enemy defensive area.
They each unload 1 Siege Tank on the cliff, which enter Siege Mode.
Build a Missile Turret and a Bunker with 4 Marines inside. The Siege Tank enters Siege Mode in your defensive area.
Build a Fusion Core. Until destroyed, it increases the energy regeneration rate of your units and halves their ability cooldowns.

Return 2 structure cards from your discard pile to your hand.
Launch a Nuke at the enemy defensive area. It lands after a delay of 1 battle phase.
